formattedAddress: 115 Washington Pl, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 115 Washington Pl, New York, NY 10014-6803, USA

originalText.text:
I have so many great things to say about Dr. Kim and his practice!!! Dr Kim has helped me feel so much more positive about my physical self! His prices are reasonable and I have found him to be completely trustworthy! Rather than encourage me to have additional work done , Dr Kim has been honest and straightforward when a procedure I am considering would not actually be a good idea.

The micro needling treatments I  get from his wife Tessa are  also extremely effective - more so than any of the expensive laser treatments I have tried and the accompanying hand massage is such a treat! I really can’t say enough positive things about Dr Kim and his team -

originalText.text: Dr. Kim is an excellent doctor; he truly cares about ensuring a natural look and never over-filling or over-botoxing or anything.  He fixed a botched surgery for me and did an excellent job.  I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for anything from a simple tweak to a major cosmetic procedure.

text.text: Dr. Kim is an excellent doctor; he truly cares about ensuring a natural look and never over-filling or over-botoxing or anything.  He fixed a botched surgery for me and did an excellent job.  I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for anything from a simple tweak to a major cosmetic procedure.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr Kim since 2018 and I have always been pleased with my results. I have seen him for botox, filler, epad, and microneedling facials. Without his guidance and treatments, I know my skin would not look the way it does. He recommended I start microneedling (a service that is provided by Tessa, who is also lovely!) over a year ago. The treatment has resulting in clearing up a scar I had on my cheekbone, and it improved the texture of my skin. I notice my pores are smaller, tighter skin and a reduction in fine lines. My complexion is better and more even toned. WV Plastic Surgery started offering a skin care line a little over a year ago and I have been using it since its inception. I really like the serums and creams that have become an intergral part of my skin care routine. I highly recommend the antiaging serum, hyaluronic acid serum, multi-correction cream and the sunblock powder. My favorite part is they have these products in travel size so it makes it really easy to stick to my skin routine while traveling.  I highly recommend West Village Plastic Surgery. The team there is wonderful!

originalText.text: Dr. Kim is tasteful and reserved in his approach to cosmetic botox. His consultation was honest and not pushy. I have been very pleased with the results which feel natural and manageable.

text.text: Dr. Kim is tasteful and reserved in his approach to cosmetic botox. His consultation was honest and not pushy. I have been very pleased with the results which feel natural and manageable.

originalText.text:
I love Dr. Kim! I have been a client for a of years now - doing different procedures as I age. I love his work and advice. The office is very accommodating to get in touch with and book an appointment.

Quick story my first experience 4 years ago  - I came in for Botox and very curious about under eye filler. I saw on social media alot of people buzzing about this. I asked him if I could do it. He told me his professional opinion that what I was looking for was not this. I was stubborn + thought I new better. I went somewhere else got it done - looked awful and hated it. I went back to him to get it removed. Lesson learned. I will always trust and value his opinion he has great patience and will talk you through each part of the way. I have done Botox, filler + chin LIPO with him. All very beautiful and natural. I highly highly recommend him and his office.
